testcase.classname: It is used to list all the countries registered in the database.
testcase.name: Success Response
testcase.system-out: Given Api kullanicisi "api/profile/allCountries" path parametreleri set eder.passed Then AllCountries icin Get request gonderilir...............................passed

testcase.classname: Used to create a new user
testcase.name: Success Response
testcase.system-out: Given Api kullanicisi "api/register" path parametreleri set eder............passed Then Register Customer icin gerekli Request Body "Ayse","Hoca","aysehoca","ay@gmail.com","1234.abc","1234.abc","customer","053621234567","44546545464546" hazirla.passed Then Register Customer icin Post request gonder.............................passed
